text: "Find Your Love" is the second single off Canadian rapper Drake's debut studio album Thank Me Later. The song was released on May 5, 2010. The song was originally made for Rihanna. Drake said that he felt the song should have been sung by a woman. On May 11, 2010, a music video for the song was released. It was shot and set in Kingston, Jamaica. The music video features Drake falling in love with a girl who has been following him. The girl is already together with a gang leader. Drake is warned but refuses to leave Jamaica without seeing her. He goes to her place but gets surrounded at her gates by a gang. Later, Drake is seen in a room, tied to a chair. The girl is revealed to have set him up and ends up shooting him. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Find Your Love" on YouTube Category:2009 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs
title: Find Your Love
